description:
In this video, we dive into the compatibility statements provided by 3rd party vendors ahead of the Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (MSFS 2024) release. Discover which add-ons and mods will be ready for the new simulator and what you can expect from your favorite developers. Whether you're a seasoned simmer or new to the flight sim community, this video will provide you with all the insights you need to prepare for the launch. Don't miss out on these essential updates and get ready to take your flight simulation experience to the next level!
